name: shivraj taware
info:
Please provide a certified copy of the land record (7/12 extract and Property Card) for the property located at [Village/CTS No./Gat No./Survey No.], Taluka [Taluka Name], District Pune, for the period from 01-01-2020 to 31-12-2024.
Please provide copies of all mutation entries (Ferfar / Mutation Register entries) related to the above property during the same period, including mutation numbers and dates of approval.
Please provide details of any government orders, circulars, or notices issued by the Revenue & Forest Department that affected ownership, classification, or usage of the above land during the said period.
